name: pnp-list-formatting-issue-tracker-planner-cards
title: Issue Tracker: Planner Cards
shortDescription: This sample is intended to be used in combination with the Issue Tracker list template. The format keeps the row highlighting for blocked issues but also adds a Tiles view that provides a Microsoft Planner look and feel.
longDescription: This sample is intended to be used in combination with the Issue Tracker list template. The format keeps the row highlighting for blocked issues but also adds a Tiles view that provides a Microsoft Planner look and feel.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
